question: For the past year I have been breaking out on my face with little tiny pimples.  It makes my face look terrible!  I have gone to a dermatolotist twice about it and he put me on antibiotics both times, telling me I have infection in my face.  The antibiotics do stop me from breaking out.    However, the antibiotics are now bothering my stomach pretty bad.  I also have diabetes.  Do you have any other suggestions?  Thanks!
title: Skin infection
